ul.li: The generation of a pair of operational AES PINPROT keys (OPOP), where one PINPROT key has usage of ENCRYPT, REFORMAT, NOFLDFMT, and ISO-4, and the other PINPROT key has usage of DECRYPT, EPINVER, NOFLDFMT, and ISO-4, is not supported in releases before Release 5.6.
The Allow GEN of OPOP EPVR/OPIN Key Pair command (offset X'039D') is not supported in releases before Release 5.6.
